name: fourth-year-electron-monorepo
description: Remote Expert is a communication system between the Microsoft Hololens, and an electron desktop application designed to help a supervisor communicate with a technician in the field

scripts.start: npm run build --prefix socket_webrtc && concurrently  "npm run build:watch --prefix socket_webrtc" "npm start --prefix node-dss-master" "npm run electron:nobuild --prefix socket_webrtc" "npm run electron:nobuild --prefix socket_webrtc"
